section.title: Release Planned Orders by Planner Code
section.para: To release planned orders by planner code, select the Release Planned Orders by Planner Code option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Release Planned Orders by Planner Code

section.para: When releasing planned orders by planner code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to release planned orders for all planner codes.
Specify planner code whose planned orders you want to release.
Enter a planner code pattern to select a range of planner codes. Refine your search using regular expressions.
Indicates the last date when planned orders by planner code may be released.
Select to release only those planned orders which have been firmed. If selected, non-firmed planned orders will not be released.
Select to release planned orders by planner code for all sites.
Specify site whose planned orders by planner code you want to release.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Releases the planned orders by planner code. The type of order created is based on the planned order supply type (purchase request, work order, or transfer order). If unreleased transfer orders exists with the appropriate From Site and To Site then planned transfer orders will be appended to the existing orders.
